Info

Defines class CatchRequest with attribute(s) and method(s). Makes a network request and handles exceptions that might occur.

class testspeednet.net.utils.catch_request.CatchRequest[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class CatchRequest with attribute(s) and method(s). Makes a network request and handles exceptions that might occur.

It defines:

attributes:
_TOOL_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
methods:
catch_request - Makes a network request.
_TOOL_VERBOSE: str = 'TEST_SPEED_NET::NET::UTILS::CATCH_REQUEST'¶
classmethod catch_request(request: Request, opener: OpenerDirector | None = None) → Tuple[HTTPResponse | None, bool | BaseException | None][source]¶

Makes a network request.

Parameters:

  • request (<Request>) – The HTTP request object to be opened

  • opener (<Optional[OpenerDirector]>) – A custom opener

Returns:

Tuple containing the HTTP response object if successful, otherwise None; and a boolean indicating no error (False) or the caught exception if an error occurs

Return type:

<CatchRequestResult>

Exceptions:

None
